name: Percent impervious area
functionStatement: Runoff and infiltration sustain natural flow regime, carry appropriate sediment and nutrients from uplands, and reliably cue spawning/migration of aquatic life.
descriptionMarkdown: Coverage is minimal, preserving near-natural infiltration/runoff timing, consistent with reference levels.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Delineate the watershed and compute percent impervious area from the most recent impervious-surface raster (for example NLCD Impervious Surface).

levels.label: Optimal
levels.criteriaMarkdown: <5% impervious. Near natural infiltration and minimal flashiness.

levels.label: Marginal
levels.criteriaMarkdown: 10-20% impervious. Partial flashiness and infiltration loss.

levels.label: Poor
levels.criteriaMarkdown: >20% impervious. Severe runoff alteration and frequent flashy peaks.
